short_description: A magnificently restored 18th-century estate set on 14 hectares on the heights of Latresne, overlooking Bordeaux and the Garonne River, offering exclusive-use weddings for up to 150 guests with 43 sleeping on-site across 6 suites and 3 guesthouses.
